analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/33/0x5c0e4f2a54f1e0716ea64de7cfe83b0cf1ad417b.sol:
	Contract PowrLedgerToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x5c0e4f2a54f1e0716ea64de7cfe83b0cf1ad417b.sol#235-239)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x5c0e4f2a54f1e0716ea64de7cfe83b0cf1ad417b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/33/0x5c0e4f2a54f1e0716ea64de7cfe83b0cf1ad417b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x5c0e4f2a54f1e0716ea64de7cfe83b0cf1ad417b.sol#103) is not in mixedCase
